pages.title: Beehive Overclocker
pages.text: You can use Beehive Overclocker to make your bee produce even more faster. It needs energy and Electrode to work, better Electrode has higher speed boost.$(br)When you use multiple overclockers at the same time, the speed boosts are additive. That means two Netherite Electrodes(x5) can make bees work x10 faster.

pages.title: Electrode
pages.text: There four tiers of electrodes, and you can find their boost in JEI/tooltip.$(br)Electrodes will get more damage with more bees in hive. The formula: floor[(x/15+1)*(1.03^x)], x is amount of bees.
